vlc media player: If the plan involves opening Tools followed by Preferences, it can be simplified into a single step: press Ctrl+P to open Preferences directly.
If the plan involves opening Media followed by Convert/Save, it can be simplified into a single step: press Ctrl+R to open Convert/Save directly.
If the plan involves opening Tools followed by Media Information, it can be simplified into a single step: press Ctrl+I to open Media Information directly.
When you need to view All interface settings, itâ€™s recommended to maximize the Preferences window after opening it.
After opening Preferences, depending on the task requirements, consider whether you need to click the 'All' button under 'Show settings' in the bottom left corner to display all settings.
After opening Preferences, if some settings are not visible in the current window, an additional step may be needed to maximize the Preferences window.
To open Effects and Filters, simply use the shortcut Ctrl+E.
To open Convert/Save, simply use the shortcut Ctrl+R.
The 'Main interfaces' option only becomes visible after clicking 'All' under 'Show settings' in the Preferences window.
To enable Qt under 'Main interfaces', you don't select it from the right panel. Instead, double click 'Main interfaces' on the left to expand the section, then click on 'Qt' from the expanded list.
When modifying the folder used to store your recordings, there's no need to click 'All' in Preferences to display all settings.
To perform a Convert/Save operation, after clicking 'Add', you must select the target file first by double-clicking, rather than clicking the Convert/Save button directly.
Double-click Main interface to expand its sub-items, then scroll the left panel if needed and click Qt.
In the All Preferences view, if you don't see Playlist in the left-hand list, scroll the left panel to locate it.
In the All Preferences view, if Qt is not visible in the left-hand list, first double-click on Main interface to expand its sub-items, then scroll the left panel to find and click Qt.
Copy the video's location from Media Information, then paste it into the File Explorer address bar to open the containing folder.
In Media Information, under the General tab, the Location field shows the full path of the current video.
Scrolling to find Qt and clicking on Qt should be separated into two subtasks.

To open Qt: go to Preferences > maximize the window(first press hotkey: Alt + Space, then press X) > double-click on Main interface > scroll to navigate to Qt (note: not Qt interface) > click on Qt in the left panel.
